item.description:
It's time to think about taxes!

 

Joe Craft, CPA will discuss the tax implications of real estate investing.

 

You don't have to know every detail of how your accountant does your taxes, but you know what they say: You don't know what you don't know.

 

Monthly Meeting

6:30 PM, Thursday, January 19, 2012

Doubletree Suites, 400 Soldiers Field Road, Boston, MA

Free for members of Boston AREIA; $25 for nonmembers

To review Boston AREIA memberships, please visit http://www.BostonAREIA.com/membership.php ;
item.how_to_find_us: Just check the Marquee to see what room we are in
item.why: Joe Craft, CPA is on our Board because he is an expert in Real Estate, Business Ownership and Home Based Business ownership. He's saved us thousands in taxes over the years. Be at this meeting!

group.name: Real Estate Networking/Education Meeting in Boston

item.name: Boston AREIA Monthly meeting
